maml:description.maml:para: Gets details about single cache or all caches in given resource group or all caches in given subscription.

The Get-AzureRedisCache cmdlet gets the details about cache or caches depending on input parameters. If ResourceGroupName and Name both parameters are provided than it will return details about specific cache name provided.
If only ResourceGroupName is provided than it will return details about all caches in given resource group.
If no parameters are given than it will return details about all caches in given subscription.
If this parameter is provided along with ResourceGroupName than it will get details about specific cache.
If this parameter is provided with Name than it will give details about specific cache otherwise get details about all cache in this resource group.
If this parameter is provided along with ResourceGroupName than it will get details about specific cache.
If this parameter is provided with Name than it will give details about specific cache otherwise get details about all cache in this resource group.
You can pipe input to this cmdlet by property name, but not by value.
Returns an array of redis caches.

maml:alert.maml:para: The Get-AzureRedisCache cmdlet is included in the Azure Resource Manager module beginning in module version 0.9.0.

command:example.maml:title: Example 1: Get specific redis cache by name
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\>Get-AzureRedisCache -ResourceGroupName myGroup -Name myexists ResourceGroupName : myGroup Id : /subscriptions/a559b6fd-3a84-40bb-a450-b0db5ed37dfe/resourceGroups/myGroup/providers/Microsoft.Cache/Redis/myexists Location : North Central US Name : myexists Type : Microsoft.Cache/Redis HostName : myexists.redis.cache.windows.net Port : 6379 ProvisioningState : succeeded SslPort : 6380 MaxMemoryPolicy : VolatileTTL RedisVersion : 2.8 Size : 1GB Sku : Basic

dev:remarks.maml:para: This command gets details about specific redis cache.

command:example.maml:title: Example 2: Get all redis caches in specified resource group
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\>Get-AzureRedisCache -ResourceGroupName myGroup ResourceGroupName : myGroup Id : /subscriptions/a559b6fd-3a84-40bb-a450-b0db5ed37dfe/resourceGroups/myGroup/providers/Microsoft.Cache/Redis/myexists Location : North Central US Name : myexists Type : Microsoft.Cache/Redis HostName : myexists.redis.cache.windows.net Port : 6379 ProvisioningState : succeeded SslPort : 6380 MaxMemoryPolicy : VolatileTTL RedisVersion : 2.8 Size : 1GB Sku : Basic
ResourceGroupName : myGroup Id : /subscriptions/a559b6fd-3a84-40bb-a450-b0db5ed37dfe/resourceGroups/myGroup/providers/Microsoft.Cache/Redis/myearlier Location : North Central US Name : myearlier Type : Microsoft.Cache/Redis HostName : myearlier.redis.cache.windows.net Port : 6379 ProvisioningState : succeeded SslPort : 6380 MaxMemoryPolicy : VolatileTTL RedisVersion : 2.8 Size : 250MB Sku : Standard

dev:remarks.maml:para: This command gets details about all redis caches in given resource group.

command:example.maml:title: Example 3: Get all redis caches in current subscription
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\>Get-AzureRedisCache ResourceGroupName : myGroup Id : /subscriptions/a559b6fd-3a84-40bb-a450-b0db5ed37dfe/resourceGroups/myGroup/providers/Microsoft.Cache/Redis/myexists Location : North Central US Name : myexists Type : Microsoft.Cache/Redis HostName : myexists.redis.cache.windows.net Port : 6379 ProvisioningState : succeeded SslPort : 6380 MaxMemoryPolicy : VolatileTTL RedisVersion : 2.8 Size : 1GB Sku : Basic
ResourceGroupName : myGroup Id : /subscriptions/a559b6fd-3a84-40bb-a450-b0db5ed37dfe/resourceGroups/myGroup/providers/Microsoft.Cache/Redis/myearlier Location : North Central US Name : myearlier Type : Microsoft.Cache/Redis HostName : myearlier.redis.cache.windows.net Port : 6379 ProvisioningState : succeeded SslPort : 6380 MaxMemoryPolicy : VolatileTTL RedisVersion : 2.8 Size : 250MB Sku : Standard
ResourceGroupName : myGroup2 Id : /subscriptions/a559b6fd-3a84-40bb-a450-b0db5ed37dfe/resourceGroups/myGroup2/providers/Microsoft.Cache/Redis/myearlier2 Location : North Central US Name : myearlier2 Type : Microsoft.Cache/Redis HostName : myearlier2.redis.cache.windows.net Port : 6379 ProvisioningState : succeeded SslPort : 6380 MaxMemoryPolicy : VolatileTTL RedisVersion : 2.8 Size : 250MB Sku : Basic

dev:remarks.maml:para: This command gets details about all redis caches in given current subscription.
